channel.title: How would i?
channel.description:
Hello, tico helped me with one of my huge client problems but i would not know how to declare [code]private final static String newline = "\n";[/code] in such a small Gui.java. I thought the it would be right before my code that has the \n in it but it like gave me one error G
[code]ui.java:384: illegal start of expression private final static String newline = "\n"; ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Thanks tico for giving me it, and now i understand how to make it on the next line but i do not understand where to declare it in a Gui.java...
Thank you, -Zaron
